speaker: President. −
english: President. − In any case the debate is closed. I am sorry, but it is not possible. I thought that you wanted to put an item on the agenda. The debate is closed. Let us proceed. ... I am opposed to this intervention. We cannot go any further with this, I thought that Mr Schulz wanted to add an item to the agenda.
original: President. − In any case the debate is closed. I am sorry, but it is not possible. I thought that you wanted to put an item on the agenda. The debate is closed. Let us proceed. ... I am opposed to this intervention. We cannot go any further with this, I thought that Mr Schulz wanted to add an item to the agenda.
agenda_item: Protection of soil - Thematic Strategy for Soil Protection (debate)
